citizen_science.desc: Any member of the general public can upload an observation of any species sighted. Other members help identify, annotate and curate the observations.
citizen_science.title: Citizen Science

datasets.desc: Diverse datasets with metadata according to the Ecological Markup Language.
datasets.title: Datasets

groups.desc: Microsites on the portal allow communities dedicated to themes of their interest to collect, curate and share content.
groups.title: Communities

idao.desc: WIKTROP IDAO is a software to aid the identification of the main weeds of cropping systems in tropical and mediterranean areas.
idao.title: IDAO

landscapes.desc: Aggregating information on India’s Landscapes with detailed information on spatial boundaries, species lists and relevant literature  on it. *Coming soon*
landscapes.title: Landscapes

literature.desc: Peer reviewed and grey literature uploaded by members or in partnership with biodiversity journals, organized with metadata and tags.
literature.title: Biodiversity Literature

maps.desc: Interact online with multiple layers of spatial data served as map layers through an interactive web-GIS module.
maps.title: Maps

mikoko_citizen_science.desc: Devoted to the diversity of socio-economic activities. Information from local communities and scientific partners involved in the management of mangrove resources. Covers uses and methods of harvests, markets and demands.
mikoko_citizen_science.title: Livelihoods & Citizen Science

mikoko_idao.desc: An interactive tool to identify mangrove species based upon observation of field characteristics
mikoko_idao.title: Identify Mangrove Species

mikoko_monitoring.desc: Monitoring activities such as tree planting, fishing, wood cutting, land occupation, as well as rehabilitation methods and techniques used in Kenya (and in other regions of the world). Highlighting challenges and best practices and challenges from initiatives on protection and restoration of mangroves.
mikoko_monitoring.title: Monitoring

mikoko_species_information.desc: Descriptive pages for every Mangrove species of Kenya curated by the team. Help collaborate and build information on Kenya's species.
mikoko_species_information.title: Species information

open_data.desc: All content on the portal is open and served under Creative Commons license for reuse and sharing with attribution to the original contributors.
open_data.title: Open Data

species_information.desc: Descriptive pages for every species from authenticated sources. Help collaborate and build information on India's species.
species_information.title: Species information

taxonomy.desc: Taxonomy and nomenclatural information on India’s species, allowing for dynamic updates for organizing and querying species data, curated by experts.
taxonomy.title: Taxonomy
